meta.title: Astrolytix — Your Astrological Key to Destiny and Personal Growth

hero.title: Astrolytix
hero.slogan: Your Astrological Key to Destiny and Personal Growth
hero.subtitle: Unlock the secrets of the cosmos and discover the path written in the stars

transits.title: Personal Transits
transits.desc: Track planetary influences on your chart

about.heading: The Wisdom of the Ancients, Powered by Modern Technology
about.text: Astrolytix combines millennia of Vedic astrological wisdom with cutting-edge AI analysis to deliver precise, personalized celestial insights. Our advanced algorithms process complex planetary data to provide you with actionable guidance for your journey of self-discovery.

horoscopes.title: Your Horoscopes
horoscopes.desc: Get personalized horoscope forecasts for tomorrow, the coming week, month, and year. Our AI analyzes your unique birth chart to deliver accurate predictions tailored specifically to you.
list: Weekly overview of opportunities and challenges

transits.title: Personal Transits
transits.desc: Track how current planetary movements interact with your natal chart. Understand the cosmic influences affecting your life right now with detailed transit interpretations.

natal.title: Natal Chart Interpretation
natal.desc: Discover the complete picture of your celestial blueprint. Your natal chart reveals your personality, strengths, challenges, and life purpose through planetary positions at birth.

divisional.title: Divisional Charts
divisional.desc: Explore the intricate Varga charts of Vedic astrology. Each divisional chart reveals specific life areas with unprecedented detail and accuracy.

mahadasa.title: Periods of Mahadasa
mahadasa.desc: Understand the major planetary periods governing your life. Mahadasa reveals the themes and energies that will dominate specific periods of your journey.

psychology.title: Astro Psychology
psychology.desc: Discover the psychological dimensions encoded in your chart. Understand your emotional patterns, relationship dynamics, and inner workings through astrological psychology.

ayurveda.title: Ayurveda Analysis
ayurveda.desc: Discover your Ayurvedic constitution through Vedic astrology. Learn about your dosha balance and receive personalized health and lifestyle recommendations.

chat.title: Chat with Astrologer
chat.desc: Get instant answers to your astrological questions from our AI-powered astrologer. Ask anything about your chart, transits, or life situations.

questions.title: Destiny Questions
questions.desc: Get answers to life's most important questions. From career and marriage to health and finances, receive astrological insights on any topic.

events.title: Events in the Sky
events.desc: Stay informed about significant celestial events. Track eclipses, retrogrades, moon phases, and other astronomical phenomena with personalized interpretations.

yogas.title: Yogas
yogas.desc: Discover the special planetary combinations in your chart. Yogas reveal unique talents, fortunes, and life patterns specific to your horoscope.

contact.heading: Begin Your Celestial Journey
contact.subheading: Ready to unlock the secrets of your cosmic destiny?

footer.tagline: Written in the stars, decoded for you.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.intro: Welcome to Astrolytix. By using our mobile application and services, you agree to these Terms of Service. Please read them carefully.

about.title: About Astrolytix
about.text: Astrolytix is an AI-powered Vedic astrology application that provides personalized astrological insights, horoscopes, psychological analysis, and wellness recommendations based on your natal chart. Our service combines ancient Vedic wisdom with modern artificial intelligence to deliver meaningful interpretations.

free.name: Free Plan
free.desc: Access core features with daily limits to explore the app's capabilities.

pro.name: Pro Plan
pro.desc: Unlock the full potential with extended limits, no advertisements, and access to all horoscope periods.

limits.title: Service Limits
limits.intro: To ensure quality service for all users and manage AI processing costs, the following limits apply:
limits.footnote: * Extended limits: Per-section daily limits are significantly increased for Pro users. While these limits are generous for normal use, overall service limits remain in place to prevent abuse and ensure fair access for all users. Limits reset daily at midnight (local time) and weekly on Mondays.

acceptable.title: Acceptable Use
acceptable.intro: You agree to use Astrolytix responsibly and not to:
list: Attempt to bypass or circumvent service limits
Use automated scripts or bots to access the service
Share your account credentials with others
Use the service for any illegal or harmful purposes
Reverse engineer or attempt to extract the AI models

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer and Limitation of Liability
disclaimer.text1: Astrolytix provides astrological interpretations, psychological insights, wellness recommendations, and related content generated through artificial intelligence for entertainment, educational, and self-reflection purposes only. All content—whether pre-defined or dynamically generated and personalized by AI—is provided "as is" without any warranties, express or implied.
disclaimer.text2: Nothing in this application constitutes professional medical, psychological, legal, financial, or any other form of licensed professional advice. You should always consult qualified professionals before making important life decisions.
disclaimer.text3: You acknowledge that content produced by artificial intelligence may contain inaccuracies, inconsistencies, or interpretations that do not align with your expectations or circumstances. AI outputs are inherently variable and should not be relied upon as factual, predictive, or authoritative.
disclaimer.text4: To the maximum extent permitted by applicable law, Astrolytix, its developers, owners, affiliates, and licensors shall not be liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages—including but not limited to loss of profits, data, goodwill, or other intangible losses—arising from or related to: (a) your use of or inability to use the service; (b) any content, interpretations, or recommendations provided through the service; (c) any actions taken or decisions made based on information obtained from the service; (d) any dissatisfaction, disappointment, or unmet expectations regarding the service or its content; or (e) any errors, inaccuracies, or omissions in AI-generated content.
disclaimer.text5: By using Astrolytix, you expressly acknowledge and agree that you use the service at your own risk and discretion. You assume full responsibility for any outcomes, consequences, or decisions resulting from your engagement with the application and its content.
disclaimer.text6: We make no representations or warranties regarding the accuracy, completeness, reliability, suitability, or availability of any astrological, psychological, or wellness interpretations. Any reliance you place on such information is strictly at your own risk.

intellectual.title: Intellectual Property
intellectual.text: All content, features, and functionality of Astrolytix, including but not limited to text, graphics, logos, and software, are the exclusive property of Astrolytix and are protected by international copyright, trademark, and other intellectual property laws.

termination.title: Termination
termination.text: We reserve the right to suspend or terminate your access to Astrolytix at our sole discretion, without notice, for conduct that we believe violates these Terms of Service or is harmful to other users, us, or third parties, or for any other reason.

changes.title: Changes to Terms
changes.text: We may update these Terms of Service from time to time. We will notify you of any material changes by posting the new Terms on this page and updating the "Last updated" date. Your continued use of the service after changes constitutes acceptance of the new terms.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.intro: If you have questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us:

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: Astrolytix ("we", "our", or "us") is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your information when you use our mobile application.

collect.title: Information We Collect
collect.deviceOnly: Information stored on your device only (never sent to our servers):
deviceList: Calculated natal chart and astrological data
Chat conversations with the AI astrologer
Psychology, Ayurveda, and other analysis results
serverList: Purchase history (product ID, purchase date, subscription type)

use.title: How We Use Your Information
use.intro: We use the limited information we collect to:
list: Provide and maintain the app service
Track purchase history for your records
Improve our app and user experience

storage.title: Data Storage and Security
storage.text1: Your personal astrological data (birth information, charts, readings) is stored exclusively on your device and is never transmitted to or stored on our servers. This ensures maximum privacy for your sensitive personal information.
storage.text2: Account-related data stored on our servers is protected using industry-standard security measures including encryption and secure authentication protocols.

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Services
thirdParty.intro: Our app may use the following third-party services:
thirdParty.openai: For AI-powered astrological interpretations. Queries are processed in real-time and not stored by us.
thirdParty.appStores: For processing in-app purchases and subscriptions.

retention.title: Data Retention
retention.text: Data stored on your device remains there until you delete the app or use the "Start Over" feature to clear your profile. Server-side account data is retained as long as you maintain an active account.

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.access: your data stored on our servers
rights.delete: your account and all associated data
rights.clear: all local data using the "Start Over" feature in the app
rights.contact: To exercise these rights or request data deletion, contact us at

children.title: Children's Privacy
children.text: Our app is not intended for children under 13 years of age. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13.

changes.title: Changes to This Policy
changes.text: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page and updating the "Last updated" date.

contactUs.title: Contact Us
contactUs.intro: If you have questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us:
